oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Panorama photograph of Confederate veterans' reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Panorama photograph of Confederate veterans and their families taken at a reunion at the Murfreesboro, Tenn., fairgrounds. Robert Cannon Garrett, former private with Jackson's Cav. Co., is seated to the right of the middle, a blue arrow above his head. Garrett was the last surviving member of Nathan Bedford Forrest's Escort. He was a member of the 56th Tennessee General Assembly, representing Bedford County.
